articles.description: Chelsea hold talks to appoint Leicester City manager Enzo Maresca, Emery signs long-term Villa contract, plus all the latest football news and gossip.
articles.title: Football latest as Chelsea hold talks with Maresca & Emery signs Villa deal

articles.description: Rafael Nadal's return to the French Open - and possible farewell - is over as the 14-time champion loses to German fourth seed Alexander Zverev.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Rafael Nadal loses to Alexander Zverev at Roland Garros

articles.description: Rachel Furness was Northern Ireland's award-winning record goalscorer but everything was not right in her world. This is why she walked away, and why she came back
articles.title: Rachel Furness: Mental health forced Northern Ireland break

articles.description: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery signs a new five-year contract with the club after taking them into next season's Champions League.
articles.title: Unai Emery: Aston Villa manager signs new five-year contract

articles.description: Ipswich Town boss Kieran McKenna is no longer in contention to become Chelsea's next manager.
articles.title: Chelsea: Kieran McKenna no longer in contention for Blues job

articles.description: Iga Swiatek begins her French Open title defence with a trademark 61-minute dismantling of qualifier Leolia Jeanjean.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Iga Swiatek begins Roland Garros title defence with 61-minute win

articles.description:
Outgoing Barcelona boss Xavi tells his successor to be prepared to "suffer"
in the role.
articles.title: Xavi: Next Barcelona manager will 'suffer'

articles.description: England captain Jos Buttler could miss Tuesday's third T20 against Pakistan for the birth of his third child.
articles.title: Jos Buttler: England captain likely to miss third Pakistan T20 for birth of third child

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo sets a new record for goals scored in a Saudi Pro League season after taking his tally to 35.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Al-Nassr forward sets new Saudi Pro League scoring record

articles.description: Rafael Nadal says he is likely to skip Wimbledon in order to protect his body and achieve his goal of playing at this year's Olympics.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Rafael Nadal prioritising Paris Olympics over Wimbledon
